## KVConnector.delete() method

Delete an entry by key

**Signature:**

```typescript
delete(modelClass: Class<Entity>, key: string, options?: Options): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  modelClass | [Class](./repository.class.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Entity](./repository.entity.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Model class |
|  key | string | Key for the entry |
|  options | [Options](./repository.options.md) | _(Optional)_ Options for the operation |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

Promise<true> if an entry is deleted for the id, otherwise Promise<false>
